p: For the installation of the experiment, 12 treatments were used, in a factorial of 3 (BA) Ã— 4 (2,4-D) with a completely randomized design, with 10 repetitions (test tubes) containing a nodal segment each. The treatments consisted of different combinations of BA (0, 1.0, and 2.0 mg/L) and 2,4-D (0, 0.25, 0.50, and 0.75 mg/L).
